data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Grossi, Paschoal Coelho, Grossi, Everardo José (2005): A new species of Brachysiderus Waterhouse, 1881 (Coleoptera: Scarabaeidae: Dynastinae) from Maranhão State, Brazil. Zootaxa 1054: 25-29, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.170073
